title: Scientists Discover Evidence Of Ancient Martian Groundwater In Antarctica
content: Though the Allan Hills 84001 meteorite was discovered in 1984, scientists have not been able to determine if the organic matter came from Mars or Earth  until now.

title: Dogs Go Through Emotional Troubles During Puberty Just Like Us, Study Says
content: Depending on the breed, dogs hit puberty when they're between four and 20 months old. Sadly, many owners relinquish their dogs to shelters during this uneasy phase.

title: Millions Of Years Are Missing From Geological History of Earth.. and Scientists Think They Know Why
content: A new geological study challenges an old theory that scientists have previously used to account for these gaps.
